title: Apollo Education Group to Present at the BMO Capital Markets 15th Annual Back to School Education Conference
text:
Apollo Education Group to Present at the BMO Capital Markets 15th Annual Back to School Education Conference Apollo Education Group, Inc. 11 hours ago  Done 
PHOENIX--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- 
Apollo Education Group, Inc. ( APOL ) today announced the Company will present at the BMO Capital Markets 15 th Annual Back to School Education Conference. The conference will be held September 10, 2015, at the Grand Hyatt New York. 
Apollo Education Group’s presentation is scheduled for 11:45 a.m. ET and will be webcast live and archived on the Investor Relations section of the Company’s website at www.apollo.edu . 
About Apollo Education Group, Inc. 
Apollo Education Group, Inc. is one of the world’s largest private education providers, serving students since 1973. Through its subsidiaries, Apollo Education Group offers undergraduate, graduate, professional development and other nondegree educational programs and services, online and on-campus principally to working learners. Its educational programs and services are offered throughout the United States and in Europe, Australia, Latin America, Africa and Asia, as well as online throughout the world. 
For more information about Apollo Education Group, Inc. and its subsidiaries, call (800) 990-APOL or visit the Company’s website at www.apollo.edu . View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150903006621/en/ Apollo Education Group
